attributes.title: Melt Fears, Go Beyond Maya Matrix
attributes.description:
In today’s morning Satsang on October 3, 2016, Paramahamsa Nithyananda defines FEAR. He explains how fear is the root that keeps us from manifesting powers and from the oneness space of Sadashivoham: “Negative visualizations, guilt, hatred towards yourself and others - all of these are fruit, flower, stem, but fear itself is the root of all of it."" Anything in the Matrix has the potential to cause fear in 
us but he goes on to describe ways that we can deflect its influence over us. One is the understanding that ultimately, there is one part of us that can never be touched by the Matrix.
